name: Cleaving
description:
When this unit initiates combat, after the resolution of that combat, deal nonlethal damage equal to 50% of the damage dealt to target foe that combat to a foe adjacent to but not behind target foe. For 4 TP, this effect may occur after a combat on enemy phase.

Disabled on weapons that are not Axes, Reason, Brawl or Swords.

modifiers.tpcost: fill affirm([Cleave on Enemy Phase?], label([After Combat], 4), 0)

comment: Items in modifers should be integers
